DC.dc:contributor: Division for income and wage statistics
DC.dc:creator: Vidar Pedersen
DC.dc:description: After-tax income is calculated as the sum of wages and salaries, income from self-employment, property income and transfers received minus total assessed taxes and negative transfers.
DC.dc:rights: Statistical Metadata, produced by Statistics Norway for production of statistics and other universal use.
DC.dc:subject: 05.01 - Income, property, taxes
DC.dc:title: After-tax income

Common.Title: After-tax income
Common.Description: After-tax income is calculated as the sum of wages and salaries, income from self-employment, property income and transfers received minus total assessed taxes and negative transfers.
